heading: Anxiety & Stress Management
para: Learn to recognize triggers, manage overwhelming thoughts, and develop effective coping tools to navigate anxiety and stress with confidence and clarity.

heading: Relationship Counseling
para: Whether you're navigating romantic, family, or peer relationships, therapy can help you build communication skills, understand patterns, and strengthen emotional connections.

heading: Trauma Recovery
para: Therapy offers a safe, supportive space to heal from past traumas, rebuild trust in yourself and others, and reclaim a sense of safety and control in your life.
